title: Luke 1
description: Luke 1 in the Liberation and Inclusion Translation (LIT).
paragraphs: 1 Many people have already tried to compile a report about the events that have been fulfilled among us…
2 …just as these things were handed down to us by those who were eyewitnesses from the beginning…
3 …so I decided to investigate everything carefully from the start and write it out in an orderly way…
